Text:
Tried to download this but there were no seeders so I went to the official site & downloaded the free 3.3.0 version real fast, also got the tutorial videos & checked out the demos, nice & easy to use software @ 
http://unity3d.com/unity/
Now to find the addon packs, if anyone finds any, please lets the rest of us know. Cheers.

@Eeee569

Sorry if it's taking time, connections here in London, UK, even if you make unlimited internet package. Sky Broadband is not that fast compared to Virgin Media. Sorry again.

@Eeee569

1. Install Unity

2. Unzip Unity.zip to your installed dir/Editor  (c:\Program Files\Unity\Editor\)
   (overwrite)

3. Start Unity and Select Manual Activation
   Click on Read License and point to the one supplied in Crack dir (UnityLicence.ilf)

4. Enjoy!

download the new one and put the crack in it and done.

I'm running Windows Vista Ultimate32bit.

I click on the exe file that included with the crack, it ask me to register. I click on manual, read license. I get the following error message: " The file does not contain valid license and cannot be used." I've been fucking around with this for the last 20 mins and read the other comments? WTF I'm doing wrong? This is s really pissing me off!!!
